assertions.assertion: sem_destroy shall destroy the unamed semaphore indicated by sem.
sem_destroy shall destroy an initialized semaphore upon which no threads are currently blocked.
sem_destroy return 0 on successful completion, otherwise, -1 returned with errno set.
EINVAL: the sem argument is not valid semaphore.
EBUSY: there are currently processes blocked on the semaphore.
The effect of calling sem_destroy on named semaphore is undefined.
The effect of destroying a semaphore upon which other threads are currently blocked is undefined.
